name: @blockstack/stacks-blockchain-api-types
description: TypeScript descriptions of Stacks 2.0 blockchain API entities

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run lint:json && npm run lint:yaml && npm run validate:schemas && npm run deploy:docs
scripts.generate:client: npm run prep-openapi && openapi-generator generate --skip-validate-spec -g typescript-fetch --additional-properties=typescriptThreePlus=true,supportsES6=true,legacyDiscriminatorBehavior=false,enumPropertyNaming=original,modelPropertyNaming=original -i ./.tmp/openapi.json -o ./client/src/generated
scripts.deploy:docs: npm run generate:types && npm run generate:docs && gulp deployDocs

author: @blockstack
